module.name: UITypes
module.short: Contains types and constants used in modal dialogs.

element.name: TMsgDlgType
element.short: Alias to the TMsgDlgType type in the FPC RTL.

descr.p: TMsgDlgType is an enumeration type that defines the type of dialog implemented in a message box. Values in the enumeration determine the caption, icon, string literals, and buttons displayed in various dialog types.
TMsgDlgType is used in several routines, such as: MessageDlg, MessageDlgPos, MessageDlgPosHelp, CreateMessageDialog, QuestionDlg, and LazMessageDlg.
descr.remark: TMsgDlgType has been deprecated in the UITypes unit for Lazarus versions after 2.0.12. Use the TMsgDlgType type from the System.UITypes unit in the FPC 3.2.0 RTL instead.

element.short: Warning message box with an Exclamation mark icon.

element.short: Error message box with Stop sign icon.

element.short: Information message box with an Info icon.

element.short: Confirmation message box with a Question mark icon.

element.name: TMsgDlgType.mtCustom
element.short: Custom message box; No icon is displayed, and the caption contains the value in ApplicationName.

element.name: TMsgDlgBtn
element.short: Alias to the TMsgDlgBtn type in the FPC RTL.

descr.p: TMsgDlgBtn is an enumeration type with values that define the buttons that can be displayed in a message dialog. TMsgDlgBtn values also determine the modal result returned from the dialog when the corresponding button is clicked.
Values in the enumeration are used in various routines, such as: MessageDlg, MessageDlgPos, MessageDlgPosHelp, CreateMessageDialog, QuestionDlg, and LazMessageDlg.
descr.remark: TMsgDlgBtn has been deprecated in the UITypes unit for Lazarus versions after 2.0.12. Use the TMsgDlgBtn type from the System.UITypes unit in the FPC 3.2.0 RTL instead.

element.short: Alias to the TMsgDlgButtons type in the FPC RTL.

descr.p: TMsgDlgButtons is a set type used to store zero or more values from the TMsgDlgBtn enumeration. TMsgDlgButtons is passed as an argument to routines like: MessageDlg, MessageDlgPos, MessageDlgPosHelp, CreateMessageDialog, QuestionDlg, and LazMessageDlg.
descr.remark: TMsgDlgButtons has been deprecated in the UITypes unit for Lazarus versions after 2.0.12. Use the TMsgDlgButtons type from the System.UITypes unit in the FPC 3.2.0 RTL instead.

element.name: TModalResult
element.short: Alias to the TModalResult type in the FPC RTL.

descr.p: TModalResult is an Integer type with a value in the range low(Integer)..high(Integer). TModalResult is the type returned by routines that display modal dialog boxes, such as: MessageDlg, MessageDlgPos, MessageDlgPosHelp, QuestionDlg, and LazMessageDlg.
The value in TModalResult indicates the button clicked to close the modal dialog, and contains one of the constant values:

descr.p: ModalResultStr is an array of ShortString values that contains the string representations for the values in TModalResult. ModalResultStr values can be accessed using the corresponding numeric modal result value. For example:
ModalResultStr is used in the implementation of the GetModalResultStr routine in the controls.pp unit.
